items.title: Data Source
items.description: Define the data source from which we can load the fields

type.title: Type
type.description: Dynamic is for forms that are created in SelfHelp, static is for upload tables, for example static uploaded data or Qualtrics data

current_user.title: Data for the logged user
current_user.description: If true, the loaded data is for the logged user, if false the loaded data is for all users in the system

table.title: Table name
table.description: The name of the form that we want to load

retrieve.title: Return
retrieve.description: Return th first record, last record as strong or all records in array for all

field_name.title: Field name
field_name.description: The field name in the form, in the uploaded table or the Qualtrics variable

field_holder.title: Field holder
field_holder.description: How we can take the value where we can use it. Always start with `@` and no space

not_found_text.title: Not found
not_found_text.description: This text will be shown if the field is not found
